content.query:
CREATE VIEW covid_cases AS
SELECT TOP (100) [date]
,[area]
,[area_type]
,[population]
,[cases]
,[cumulative_cases]
,[deaths]
,[cumulative_deaths]
,[total_tests]
,[cumulative_total_tests]
,[positive_tests]
,[cumulative_positive_tests]
,[reported_cases]
,[cumulative_reported_cases]
,[reported_deaths]
,[cumulative_reported_deaths]
,[reported_tests]
 FROM [dbo].[cases]
